 `.________________________________________________________________.' _.' _.' .

 .----------------------------- r e l e a s e info --------------------------+
 -  Block Story combines role playing game in an infinite world made out  of '
 '  blocks.

 `  If  you  like  games  like  Minecraft, Survivalcraft  and  the o riginal
 `  Infiniminer, but wished that there where  quests,  and  that  you  could
 `  level  up  and  develop  your  character, you  have  found what you were
 .  looking for.
 :
 |  Features :
 |
 |  Ã‚Âº Infinite world even up and down.
 |  Ã‚Âº Quests, that give you objectives and hours of fun.
 |  Ã‚Âº Leveling up, and skill points to improve your character.
 |  Ã‚Âº Beautiful  terrain  generation  with  Hell,  biomes, floating islands,
 |    forgotten sky, underground world and coral reefs.
 |  Ã‚Âº Torches you can make and carry to light your way through caves.
 |  Ã‚Âº Equipment  you  can  wear  like  My  Precious  (a powerful ring),  and
 |    flippers (to swim faster).
 |  Ã‚Âº Crafting.
 |  Ã‚Âº Many weapons, like swords, magic, shields, guns, bow and arrow.
 |  Ã‚Âº 87  realistic  mobs,  from lizards to dragons, from clownfish to giant
 |    sharks.
 |  Ã‚Âº Beautiful  graphics,  with  colored lights, epic night sky, and bumped
 |    terrain.
 |  Ã‚Âº Vehicles like cars and boats for your long trips (more coming).
 |  Ã‚Âº Frequent updates.
 |  Ã‚Âº Teleporting.
 |  Ã‚Âº A Radar to find important objects around you.
 |  Ã‚Âº Creative mode with crafting.
 |  Ã‚Âº Very fast, it works well even in older computers.
 |                                                                           :
 |  More info : http://www.blockstory.net/pc                                 |
 |                                                                           |
 |  Support Developers, vote this game on Steam Greenlight at :              |
 |                                                                           |

|   |
|   |  Notes: Game is MULTI5, English, German, French, Spanish and Russian.
